title: OK........ new champ, just read
body:
ok I was sitting in my room thinking about and new champ ( well not really thinking but it popped in my head) of a champion who is bouncy like Gnar but strong and bursty like a Syndra, to be honest I don't know what im talking about but here we go

ok so I don't know the statistics but one ability would be called "make room" where the champ would jump onto the enemy and shove them back to the direction you jumped, with long range it would be a dic move so it has short range.

another is like a kassadin w or e where he pushes back in a cone, or like Syndra.

I cant really think of anything else but your free to make a discussion over it I need an ulty and one more ability and a passive.
COOL
tell me what you think

replies.body: So like {{champion:17}} with a broken set of cc and escapes like {{champion:421}}

sounds like you just thought "make room" would be a cool name for an ability LOL don't really see a concept here

if you had some basis like, it could be one of Azir's soldier come to life, and he is ability was "make room" for the emperor or something.
i did leave a concept.... i explained the ability afterwards
Coming up with 4 + abilities would probably be my first step but where your going isn't bad.
So you want Satan, but more evil?
you know..... that could work, btw the abilitys are not as op as you think his jump is very short range and only pushes back like 150 range, hahaha when I saw this I laughed for ages
